section.title: Release 1.0.1 (July 11, 2013)
section.para: This is a minor bugfix release.

listitem.para: Reduce parallelism for running EC2 backups, to prevent hammering the AWS API in case of many disks.
Propagate the instance tags to the EBS volumes (except for Name tag, which is overriden with a detailed description of the volume and its use).
